TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RangeValuePattern/RangeValuePatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.
Docs.value: Se o valor é somente leitura; se ele pode ser modificado. O padrão é .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Um controle deve ter sua <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> definido como `true` e sua <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> definida como `false` antes da criação de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> objeto.
## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valor.
[!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LargeChange As Double
public: property double LargeChange { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.
Docs.value: O valor de grandes alterações ou se não tiver suporte para o elemento . O valor padrão é 0,0.

remarks.format:
## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Maximum As Double
public: property double Maximum { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
Docs.value: O valor máximo com suporte a [! Elemento include[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-UIAutomation-MD.MD)] ou se não tiver suporte para o elemento . O valor padrão é 0,0.

remarks.format:
## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem o valor definido como o valor máximo do controle específico.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SmallChange As Double
public: property double SmallChange { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.
Docs.value: O valor de pequena alteração exclusivo para o [! Elemento include[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-UIAutomation-MD.MD)] ou se não tiver suporte para o elemento . O valor padrão é 0,0.

remarks.format:
## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange%2A> valor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Double
public: property double Value { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
Docs.value: O valor atual de [! Elemento include[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-UIAutomation-MD.MD)] ou se não tiver suporte para o elemento . O valor padrão é 0,0.

remarks.format:
